seprhou.network

Class NetworkCommon<TEndPoint extends com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.EndPoint>

  • java.lang.Object
    • seprhou.network.NetworkCommon<TEndPoint>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, GameEndpoint
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiClient, MultiServer

    public abstract class NetworkCommon<TEndPoint extends com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.EndPoint>
extends Object
implements GameEndpoint
    Class which handles common network initialization tasks

    • Field Detail

      • PROTOCOL_VERSION

        protected static final int PROTOCOL_VERSION
        Version of the protocol

        This ensures that both the client and server agree on the format of messages passed between them.

        This MUST be incremented when:

        • Adding or removing any messages
        • Adding, removing or changing the type of any field in a message
        • Changing the order of message registration
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getFailException

        public IOException getFailException()
        Description copied from interface: GameEndpoint
        Returns the exception which caused the connection to close

        If GameEndpoint.getState() returns GameEndpointState.CLOSED, then you can call this method to get the reason. Often, this method will still return null if no extra information can be obtained.

        Specified by:
        getFailException in interface GameEndpoint

      • getAirspace

        public Airspace getAirspace()
        Description copied from interface: GameEndpoint
        Returns the airspace controlled by this endpoint

        Returns NULL if no game is active (eg connecting, waiting for connection, game ended, etc)

        Specified by:
        getAirspace in interface GameEndpoint
        Returns:
        the active airspace or null if no game is active
